ProductInfo.Features: 4 Inch Waterproof Android Phone with 1.3GHz Dual Core CPU, IP67 Waterproof and Dustproof, GPS and more. A waterproof phone for everyday use.   "Haier", one of China's biggest publicly traded and most known white goods manufacturers has dedicated its knowledge and long time experience into the mobile phone field to create a waterproof and dustproof Android phone which is suitable for daily use. Light, compact and easy to use, the "W718" comes with a 1.3GHz Dual Core CPU and a well sized 4 inch screen, on which you can conveniently watch movies, browse the web or even control professional apps.   Perfect for those looking for a waterproof phone but don't want to switch to a fully rugged phone, the "Haier W718" offers the exact balance between portability and functionality. When camping, out on the lake, or during summer times on the beach, the "W718" offers full protection against water and dust ingression. On top of that, thanks to Android 4.2, you will have access to the Google Play store where hundreds of thousands of apps can be downloaded. Furthermore, GPS, Bluetooth, dual cameras and an FM radio function come standard.
ProductInfo.Name: 4 Inch Waterproof Android Phone "Haier W718" - 1.3GHz Dual Core CPU, IP67 Waterproof and Dustproof, GPS
